author: edwingo
msg: Integrated feedback from Neil Graham.  Added code to fallback on the
current ClassLoader if a provider could not be found using the Context

author: edwingo
msg: New version of FactoryFinder adds doPrivilege blocks to code so it will run
properly in environments that use SecurityManagers such as in servlet
containers or J2EE servers.  Also tries to load Service Provider from
context ClassLoader and then current ClassLoader.  Note: Because of
complexities with Java security and reflection, code will not compile with
JDK 1.1 but will run in JDK 1.1 and above.

author: edwingo
msg: file SecuritySupport.java was initially added on branch java2-branch.
